doc.title: Stag: Real. Naked. Stress.
doc.plot: Two new bachelor parties, two nights of excess... but will there be two weddings? Watch as cowboy Tim's rowdy friends manage to get him in trouble and even naked. Then the second bachelor dons a Pee Wee costume for his last night. Witness as Pee Wee and three lovely ladies become so covered in whip cream that his wife may not even recognize him, much less forgive him.
